name: DETAUX by Designerrs – Talk slides 20/09/2020
description:
Slides presented for the Indian design community.


– What is Figma?

– Where does it fit within the design process of a designer in 2020?

– What are my tips for getting started in the industry?

– What plugins and community resources can help you supercharge your workflow?
